name: Bang! Bank!
overview: Somewhere between a shooter and a reaction game, Bang! Bank! is a clone of Bank Panic. The player takes on the role of a bank security guard of the Wild West, protecting the bank's twelve doors on each level. Three doors are visible on the screen at a time, and the player can walk right or left to reveal other doors. Customers and bandits come through the doors; bandits must be quickly shot before they do the same to you, but shooting an innocent person by accident results in losing a life. If a customer is able to enter the bank unmolested, they will deposit money; once all 12 doors have had customers deposit money through them, the next level begins.
